website_summaries.verdict: The best option for small dogs who are especially vulnerable to unintentionally hurting themselves by pulling too hard during walks.
pros: Evenly distributes pressure across shoulders and chest
cons: The color and size combination you need may not be available

customer_reviews.title: Fits just right and doesn't bother my dog
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dog harness! I love step-in harnesses because they are easy to take off and on and this one is absolutely perfect. Fits my medium-sized, 15 pound dog well without digging in or causing discomfort. My dog doesn't try to bite at this harness at all like he usually does with others. I've tossed out all my other harnesses for this one and will re-purchase if it gives out at any point. I really like the double links for clipping the leash too because it adds more security, and therefore, peace of mind. The clip is also really easy to take off which is not always the case. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rororo

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my MegaE Boston Terrier
customer_reviews.text: My Boston Terrier has MegaEsophogus which causes regurgitation of food eaten hours earlier. It's a must that I have a harness that falls below the throat while walking him as this exacerbates his condition. With this "Step-in" harness, it sits low on his chest yet does a good job of holding him back. Putting the harness on can be a bit of a challenge but I've figured that out rather quickly. There is a bit of stretch after a month or 2 of use but not enough to make the harness useless. And you can tighten it if you need to. All in all I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: M. Skeans

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! The size Small Fits my 4 month old ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! The size Small Fits my 4 month old Boston Terrier perfectly with room to grow. I want every color! Finally a great harness. This company makes wonderful coats too.
customer_reviews.author: Lilybee

customer_reviews.title: Almost BINGO
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my little 14-pound Houdini-canine with the hope that it would not come in contact with his throat area AND he would not be able to free himself from it. Well, even in putting it on snugly, all he has to do is suddenly stop or back up while on leash and off the harness starts to come! I still use this product, as I like how it fits on him, but I still have to watch for any sly moves to escape on his part because he will still be the winner of this ongoing dilemma of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett's Admirer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off but awkward to adjust
customer_reviews.text: This is the second harness I bought for my cavalier puppy. The first one was the type that goes over the head. There was too much struggling and too many parts for him to latch on to and chew. He actually cracked the latch with his teeth! This step-in version is much easier to put on and take off. However, I’m finding it difficult to determine how tightly to adjust the straps. One side is folding inward under his leg while the other lies flat. The adjustment is identical for each side. What gives? The other thing is there are 2 D-rings to latch his leash onto. Whomever designs these should have a squirming, teething puppy as a test subject!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H Muir

customer_reviews.title: Really nice harness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try. We like to be able to let our small dog run around the house “naked”, and this is so easy to slip on and off when she needs to go out. I clip on top, and away we go. I really like the metal rings on either side of the clasp also. I attach her lease to both rings, so no worry about the clasp coming open while we are out. Glad we found this. We have used Gooby harnesses for years, and love the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: easy to escape
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to put on my dog but also very easy to escape. My 14 Ibs bichon easily succeed in escape twice in one week. Very dangerous
customer_reviews.author: A good customer

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great- not good for active dogs
customer_reviews.text: I returned this just to have the replacement literally rip off my dog, I should have kept the pictures, It kept ripping material above the x and my dog pulled and it ripped in half. I’m sad because this was easy to get her in. The material needs to be reinforced with backing and triple stitched. I bought a harness from target and it was made better than this and half price. This was my 3 time buying Gooby because she is puppy and I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana O

customer_reviews.title: Size Does Matter
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product is misleading. I purchased the "Large" not realizing it meant large SMALL dog. It claimed to fit up to a 21 inch chest but fully extended barely reached the 14 inch mark. Cheaply made, it would have never held back my 30 lb mix even if it had fit. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Luinsan

customer_reviews.title: Small Gooby Step In is good fit for my Min Pin
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a small for my one year old twelve pound Min Pin. There is a little bit of adjustment room left so it fits her well. It is much softer and not as wide as her old step in harness. I think it is probably much more comfortable for her. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ga Mtn PeachTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: As described and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and would buy again. After measuring and weighing my dog, I purchased this product in large. His measurements were at the bottom end of the scale and the harness fits fine but has little adjustment left for expansion. It looks good and totally eliminates choking from pulling. Very easy on and off. My dog seems very comfortable wearing it. I do remove it easily when not out walking. My only negative is that the harness has two loops that the leash attaches to. When the leash is not attached and the dog shakes the loops hit each other and make an incredibly loud noise. Minor complaint but I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: billwunder

customer_reviews.title: Good harness!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first harness, so I don't have a lot to compare to. I bought it for my 19lbs Maltipoo after my vet recommended this particular one and it works great. The sizing was a bit odd. I measured as instructed and bought the Large. Got it and it was WAY too big for him. Had to return to get the medium, which is barely big enough. It seems to be pretty comfortable on him and he's never gotten out of it after about a month of use. It would be nice if there was a more appropriate place to put tags on it, but that's no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: RandyD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome harness for smooshy faced breeds...
customer_reviews.text: As a pug owner for nearly 15 years, it's been hard to find a harness that fits their broad chest but doesn't put any stress on the base of the neck/trachea, but this harness is perfect! Fits comfortably and appropriately, is made from a soft breathable material, and my pug can't back out of it like some of the other harnesses we've tried over the years. Would highly recommend for short, stout breeds! One thing to keep in mind is that this harness is designed and marketed to small dogs (pugs, bostons, frenchies, etc), so the sizing may seem different. I used the measurement recommendations and ended up with the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made harness; easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This harness has worked better then any other I have tried. My little dog pulls when she sees another dog, causing her to choke. This fits nicely, fastens well & fit her well. She’s a toy poodle, weighing 11 lbs. I was able to adjust the harness as well. I ordered the small & ordered a 2nd one. While it does not totally rectify the coughing, it fits lower in front and I believe has helped. Her behavior is another story. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S

customer_reviews.title: Very little ability to adjust straps
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these harnesses in size medium for my 15.5 lb dog. They barely fit him. There is almost no ability to adjust the straps to make the harness larger. I got these step-in harnesses because they are well-made, lightweight, and don't choke my dog because of the X design. My dog is terrified of anything that needs to go over his head. I bought spare harnesses because my boy is a chewer. If he manages to grab hold of his harness, it will be in pieces. Unfortunately for me, he doesn't like dog toys designed for chewing. I have about 6 other harnesses and the same number of leashes he has chewed up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Does not carry a size that fits my dog
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a nice quality harness, but unfortunately it does not carry the right size for my 18 pound Boston’s Terrier. The large fit her poorly, with the tightest setting being a little too loose on her. I ordered the medium hoping it would fight but it is much much too tight at its loosest. I’m a little disappointed but leaving a review in case future buyers have a similarly sized Boston.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Teenie tiny. Didn't fit my 9 1/2 pound Morkie. Color is nice. Style is what we were looking for, but this might fit a toy chihuahua. The integrity of the company disappoints me. They advertise a free return. It is absolutely not free. Make sure you're getting the right size so you don't end up paying more for the very same item for $9 more.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Earrings

customer_reviews.title: did notify
customer_reviews.text: I immediately returned this item. At the same time I returned the other that did not fit. They are claiming they did not get it. I have now been charged for an item I have returned. I recommend you do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 13lb schnoodle
customer_reviews.text: Durable and cute, we love Gooby! It can be a little tricky to hook the leash in both rings when my dog is doing his crazy dance before a walk, but overall a great harness!
customer_reviews.author: Emma and Tony

customer_reviews.title: Best non-choking harness I've found, and I'm pretty sure I've tried them all!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried SO many harnesses for my terrier/pomeranian/maltese mix. He is just below 13 pounds and measured toward the top of the size guide for a size medium, and the medium fits him perfectly. This is the best non-choke harness I've found so far. My dog pulls really hard when he gets excited and every other 'no-choke' harness induced a terrible coughing fit when he pulled. This one isn't perfect, but it is miles better than any of the others. And meanwhile, we're working on not pulling on the leash! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Not reccommended for active dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my dog for only a short time. Although it appeared comfortable for the most part and the chest was adjustable, it still hung too loose in the front and my dog kept getting his front leg through it when he rolled and then would be restricted in movement somewhat. It needs either an additional adjustment feature or better adjustment proportions. Even with snugging the chest, the front strap still hung too loose kept getting in the way of his front legs. It might be good for a less active dog, but I wouldn't recommend it for a dog who likes to run and roll around.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Minimal and does exactly what it was meant for without being restrictive.
customer_reviews.text: I like this harness because it easily snaps on and off without having to pull it over my dogs head. The double hooks in the back are also perfectly positioned to be pulled through the buttonhole on some dog clothing. If you have dog clothing without that little button hole feature, no worries...... your leash hook or seat belt tether can slip gently underneath the clothing and still grip without any discomfort. This harness also doesn't go so far up the neck that you feel like your dog will be choking.
customer_reviews.author: Gosh Darn

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I like this harness a lot so far! I love that it's only one buckle to put it on (I hate when I have to do 2 buckles and my pup is squirming around). Seems pretty good quality, only time will tell. The only slight con would be that it isn't the best harness from reducing my pup from choking himself, but much better than a standard harness. I've just used other Gooby harnesses that prevent choking better. My pup doesn't seem to mind it either, it fits well enough that he's not able to start chewing on the front when it's on. Will update if anything changes but so far for $15 it's a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Miquela Sauerzopf Ciccarelli

customer_reviews.title: Great for my french bulldog
customer_reviews.text: Great for my french bulldog. Worked when he was 9 weeks and he is 8lbs now and 12weeks and still fitting in it great. Does not choke him!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this harness for my dog that has a pinched nerve in his neck. I was looking for a harness that did not restrict the neck at all: front, back or sides. This did the trick very nicely. I only gave it 4 starts however because the D-Rings that the leash attaches to are huge and my leash clip is too small to accommodate both rings. Since this is billed as a small dog harness, it would make much more sense to use D-Rings that are small enough to accommodate smaller leash clips. If not for that, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jiff's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Super secure
customer_reviews.text: It's quite easy to slip on the dog and I really like having two rings at the top to which a leash can be attached. Having the two loops makes it almost impossible for the plastic closing clip to brake or slip out if the dog really stats tugging. The only issue is getting the correct size. If you have a growing puppy, you might want to go up one size over the recommended size based on chest girth or you will end up buying another, larger harness in a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: ultragolden

customer_reviews.title: Five harnesses and none fit UNTIL THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: Problem solved! Amazing find! I have bought five harnesses for my mini doxie since I got him a few months ago and he's always right between sizes. He's nine pounds so his body is really skinny but his chest is more broad than the average doxie so it's been a real struggle UNTIL THIS HARNESS. I originally bought a small and it was a bit too snug in the chest area so I exchanged for the medium and it's absolutely perfect! Thank you Gooby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buckles expand with wear, but overall a comfortable and sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfortable and overall a nice purchase. The buckles that tighten regularly slip and make the harness bigger so I’m often tightening them again, but our puppy is still secure, it just gets loose. He’s a furry cocker spaniel but for a dog with short hair I would worry about skin irritation. It’s breathable, great color options and I usually replace the emblem with a sewn on bow tie, which adds some pizzazz. The fit is accurate to slightly bigger. With a growing puppy I went with the size that started at 18” (M?).
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not for laggers
customer_reviews.text: Slips off my dog that likes to lag behind when we walk. She stops behind me to sniff, drops her head, and when I gently pull the leash to get her moving, it slips off over her head with the buckle still fastened. Maybe a safety feature for an unattended dog? My other dog likes to pull when we walk, never an issue of his Gooby slipping off, his is comfort x, not step in, but i think it is more where your dog walks.
customer_reviews.author: LDGS

customer_reviews.title: Nice harness, a little too big
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 18 pounds and has a 20-inch chest. I got him the Large, based on those measurements. After tightening it as much as I can, it fits, just barely. Chest fits better than the neck, which is a bit loose. If it stretches at all, we're out of luck. However, walking him with this harness on makes a world of difference. He doesn't pull, he doesn't choke. So we'll see how it goes from here. I might invest in a Medium size and see how that works.
customer_reviews.author: Scrumpy

customer_reviews.title: Helps a little with pulling
customer_reviews.text: My little Schnauzer mix, Sasha, is a nutcase. I love her SO much, but she's also just wild. I've never had a dog with as much energy as her and I grew up with dachshunds. My other dog, Sadie, is the chillest of the illest. So we compromise with walks (and additional playtime and swim-time with Sasha while Sadie chills and watches us, probably secretly making fun of me), and this product has helped with Sasha's pulling quite a bit. If she sees or smells something she wants to get to REALLY bad, she's still gonna try to draw and quarter me, but it's not constant anymore so that's cool.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Harper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have an aging 8# Rat Terrier/Chihuahua mix that has begun choking and coughing from determined pulling on walks with her old harness so I needed something that would prevent or at least minimize that. While this one is not 100% (she's pretty determined and will strain at the end of the lead if there's something she really wants to smell) it is pretty close. Walks are lots less stressful for us both now. Size small was perfect for her despite her having an odd shape and always being hard to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered extra large for my 44 lb standard poodle and it barely fits. The design seems good it fits well clear of her neck. I wish the makers would figure out not everyone buys these to control pulling. I walk with a retractable leash, which means there is always a bit of tension even if the dog doesn't pull, our dog is older and has some issues with coughing etc. so I don't want ANY tension on her collar. I don't need a corrective device just a comfortable one.
customer_reviews.author: Holiday

customer_reviews.title: It's a good harness so far.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two different harnesses from two different brands (including this one) expecting to return one. I ended up keeping both. This one is great for taking my dog out to go potty. One clip means it's easy to put on and easy to take off. No velcro to go bad. The other harness is good for walks. I was worried that it wouldn't hold up well because the mesh seems very thin, but so far we haven't had any issues. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: bond5

customer_reviews.title: Enna says it's comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Enna weighs about fifteen pounds (just a bit overfed). I don't like using collars and only use the harness for our short daily walks. The straps are wide and don't seem to cut into her like ones I've bought with narrower straps. The harness is easy to put on, although she has trouble lifting her left front leg. The snap seems robust. Enna would have preferred a pink harness, but the black one was significantly less money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: best thing I've purchased for my super active dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a 25-lb Border Collie mix. He's an other-worldly level of active and a pain in the butt to walk on a leash. A friend suggested I buy him a harness, so I bought this. Best thing ever! Yes, he still pulls, but I can control him and he's not choking himself the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Houdini
customer_reviews.text: I despaired ever finding something that would securely contain my slippery eel of a beast. She doesn't even **wiggle** out of other harnessed... it's magic: i think she's secure in the harness attached to the seatbelt and seconds later, she's in the front seat in my lap, harness and seatbelt completely in tact, lying on the back seat. This harness is absolutely lovely!! It is stylish, secure, easy to put on and take off, easy to adjust. I'm so happy with it, i'm going to get my big dog one even though she is not as sneaky.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable enough
customer_reviews.text: Though I measured per instructions the harness was too big and not adjustable enough to fit. There is no ring on the front for dog tags so low mark for security. Kind of flimsy but adequate for a small dog. Stretchy? Not so much. I returned it and ordered the next smaller size. It arrived today. At the largest adjustment this was slightly too small with no room for further adjustment. So the big was too big. The small was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Beaugy

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is way off, from their own products??
customer_reviews.text: Bought this exact harness in red ages ago and it fits my dog perfectly. I decided to get one and black and it is huge! But it is the same type and size... I am so confused. Don't want to exchange it for another size because I have no idea what I will get.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Not a fit for my Shih-Tsu Mix
customer_reviews.text: This harness seemed very promising for my 15 lb Shih-Tzu mix who gags with harnesses that pull around the throat area. The harness seemed pretty secure and appeared to pull in the right areas, however, my dog still gagged when I pulled him in this harness. The older version, the Comfort X harness, works better for him. Maybe this harness is designed more for barrel chested dogs?
customer_reviews.author: TryingItOut

customer_reviews.title: After trying 6 harnesses finally found the ONE
customer_reviews.text: We have a small (17 lb) schnoodle and we tried 6 other harnesses which just did not seem to work. She would either pull and choke herself or she just wouldn't move at all. This harness is lightweight and easy to get on and off. There is no pulling/choking going on and although our pup is not a fan of going for walks this is the only harness we can get her to move in at all! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mjjpower

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this harness! I got a small because I have a Pomeranian and it is choke free for real! Finally what a great product that actually doesn't choke. and I noticed that today when I got the product and took my dog for a walk he was walking right next to me rather than pulling and yanking. I absolutely love this product it's well-constructed,so easily put on and my dog loves it too! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: A harness that's easy.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs and I really like these harnesses. In fact, I like them so much I ordered two more. They are easy for my dogs to get into and are not binding. I am especially happy with the sizing. My miniature Doxie is petite and this harness comes in a size small that fit her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Devins Nana

customer_reviews.title: May not always get the same harness
customer_reviews.text: I liked this harness so much I ordered a new one for my Yorkie. When I received it, it was not like the first one I had purchased the only piece of metal on it was the d-rings for attaching the leash. On the first harness all parts minus the clasp were metal. On the 2nd it was the complete opposite. I returned the 2nd harness. Guess I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Banshee

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is wrong
customer_reviews.text: I see others were also complaining about the sizing chart. I have an Italian Greyhound so its very important I find something adjustable that works for him. their necks are way smaller than their chest. I thought this was going to work but the neck size is way big...it says neck is 17-21.5 on pkaging. On amazon it gives that as chest size.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Good harness but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good harness that does well with dogs with no or small shoulders like a Chihuahua or whippet. It appears to have good construction, but for what it is, I still believe it is overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Fire it up

customer_reviews.title: She doesn't pull nearly as much.
customer_reviews.text: sure, there is the occasional pull when she sees a chipmunk or bunny, but when out for a general walk she doesn't pull anymore. I love it. And when she does pull I don't worry about her harming her neck area. If i had one criticism, it's a little bit too big for her. It works, and we hope she'll grow into it (she's 2).
customer_reviews.author: suzr

customer_reviews.title: Run very small
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-made harness but the sizing is terrible... I got a medium for our 16 pound mini Labradoodle and it barely fits... The old step in harness was the best, wish they still made them...
customer_reviews.author: elli girl

customer_reviews.title: Best harness I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I have a Maltese/Chinese crested she is around 8lbs, was choking when she pulled on previous harnesses this has improved situation greatly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate sizing
customer_reviews.text: This sizing is a mess! After reading a previous review I checked the sizing directly on the GoobyPet website and it said XL was 19"-24.5". On Amazon it said 20.5"-26". The packaging of the harness actually says 21.5"-27.5". My dog's chest is 20.5" so based the manufacturers website, it should have fit. It also says "If your dog is between sizes, please size up." Looks like a decent harness, but back it goes!
customer_reviews.author: D.Tinney

customer_reviews.title: Asked for return only half money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small for a 9 pound French bulldog, and it’s too small. Tried to do an echange or a refund, only half the money back because of shipping fees. never again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great little harness
customer_reviews.text: I have a little fast growing houdini pup. This is a great little harness, holds him securely. He doesn't mind wearing it and we have to wear it going outside because he can slip out of a collar. I will get another in a bigger size when he outgrows this one.
customer_reviews.author: jtaylor

customer_reviews.title: Favorite dog harness
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Excellent lightweight and secure design. My small dogs are comfortable wearing this harness. I prefer step in harnesses as dogs seem to dislike items going over their heads. Easy and quick to put on. My favorite brand after owning dogs over 25 years and trying many designs. Fit is very true to size
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Gooby - Comfort X Step-in Harness is Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Have a 16 pound Havanese and have struggled to find harnesses that were a good fit. Her neck is about 14" and girth 21.5". Purchased three Gooby Harnesses and this one just didn't fit my girl and I am returning it. But it's very well constructed. High quality merchandise. Worth trying if you have a hard to fit dog like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Native

customer_reviews.title: Collapsing Trachea
customer_reviews.text: I was searching high and low for a good harness that wouldn't put any pressure on my toy pomeranian's neck due to his diagnosis of collapsing trachea. He coughs quite a lot and I hate that his current harness tugged on his trachea and this collar is absolutely amazing. I love that he can enjoy his walks.
customer_reviews.author: Mystic Star

customer_reviews.title: Good harness
customer_reviews.text: I got this in size small for my 6lb havanese. It fits her well at the tightest adjustment. She's very comfortable in it and it doesn't slide off her. A successful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie F.

customer_reviews.title: No more Houdini
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my famous escape artist and so far she hasn’t gotten out. Of course, it’s not that bad because she just stands like a mannequin when her harness comes off, but it can get frustrating
customer_reviews.author: popplemom

customer_reviews.title: Bar far the best harness for tiny dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best harness for my little one that I have ever purchased. It is lower on the throat than most causing less problems. It stays securely snug; it doesn't loosen over time like others. I got a color that blends with her coat so it is pretty much invisible except for her tags.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Glad we found this harness
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this harness and it has really solved the problem of our dog pulling too hard on her leash and damaging her esophagus. The harness is comfortable for the dog, does not press on the throat, and goes on quickly. Be careful to follow the instructions for measuring size. I was surprised that our 22 lb Yorkie/Eskimo mix needed a large (she measured 18" around the torso), but it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ed in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our 25lb frenchies, almost expecting them not to fit as Gooby is often for the smaller pups. These harnesses are well made with nice hardware, adjust easily for both dogs (one has a broader chest), and I love the low front that stays off their necks. My dogs prefer a collar, but tolerate these well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: BK NY

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: The Gooby Comfort X Step-in Harness is well made, comfortable and easy put on the dog before a walk. Note: Do not leave the harness on the dog which not only would be uncomfortable, but cause matting due to the constant friction against the dog's coat. The "Small" fits my 11-lb Coton de Tulear perfectly. Her neck measures 9.5 inches and her chest measures 16.5 inches.
customer_reviews.author: n1cf2

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTWEIGHT, BREATHABLE MATERIAL, EASY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a larger size to be used OVER an insulated dog snowsuit to take up slack in the suits chest area which is too broad for pup and to prevent pup’s front leg(s) from disappearing inside the suit which is causing him to stumble. We already own multiples of these and love the quality, comfort fit.
customer_reviews.author: SAAJAB

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality for a  dog harness. My dog was able to rip it in half! Super Cheap & poorly made !
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality & complete waste of money. My yorkie pup is not an aggressive chewer yet somehow managed to completely chew through this harness. Harness even last 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: cherie

customer_reviews.title: It's a Gooby
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. We managed to get a snug fit on our 5 lb Yorkie and took him camping and he never got out of it when we were on the trails. Of course with the name like gooby it has to be good
customer_reviews.author: D. Beirne

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried lots of harness’s for my westie ! This one is best !
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny westie ( 15 lbs ) that I bought this for , it fits her securely and comfortably ! I highly recommend th is and it’s about 2/3 what you would pay in pet stores !! I honestly like everything I’ve ordered from “ Gooby” I like the fleece pullovers they make for my hairless dogs ( chinese cresteds ) they’re not too hot or cold !
customer_reviews.author: MtnBrookieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfort X harness vs Active X harness
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made harness but we are returning it b/c it is too big for our Corgi-Chi mix. We ordered the Large. Our dog is 19 lbs,, 19 inches around the chest and 15 inches around the neck. Found another Gooby harness that fits him better - the Gooby Active X Step-in. The Comfort X Large we are returning is for dogs 18-30 lbs; the Active X Large is for dogs 15-20 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: walterco-sd

customer_reviews.title: Fits my small Pomeranian
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS HARNESS!!!!!! Finally found one that fits a 4 lb Pomeranian and doesn't rub around the neck. Great quality and the red color matches the photo. I will buy this again if my puppy outgrows a small size.
customer_reviews.author: valkyrie

customer_reviews.title: Best harness for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: Great harness for my dog! Just make sure you get the appropriate size. She seems to work best with this style and it doesn’t hurt her under her arms or in her arm pits like some have. I like that they have many color options and that it is easy to wash and care for.
customer_reviews.author: Nannie D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on, and no pressure on the throat
customer_reviews.text: I am very Happy with this harness. It sits perfect on my Chavachon. I was looking for a harness Thant puts zero pressure on his next and this is perfect. He enjoys walking now, before he was shaking his head and making funny noises I guess from the pressure on his neck. He is 17lbs is wearing a medium. Very easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A perfect choice!
customer_reviews.text: I have a miniature Docksin puppy and was concerned that it would not fit once received. It not only fit the description matched the item perfectly. I love the color and the fabric. Once my dachshund is full-grown I will definitely buy the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: ladywestcott

customer_reviews.title: DON'T LIKE THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE A GOOBY MY PUP WEARS EVERY DAY BUT IT IS NOT LIKE THIS ONE. THE PRICE IS THE SAME BUT THE FIT AND QUALITY OF MATERIALS HAVE DEFINITELY DECREASED. TOO SMALL. INFERIOR QUALITY OF MATERIAL, SCRATCHING AND ROUGH. THIS ONE IS GOING BACK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Wont choke your pet
customer_reviews.text: This harness is the best one I've tried to keep my dog from choking. She is however able to slip out of it if she stops and backs up, it comes off over her head. She learned this trick at the vet. I found if you pull straight up when she starts to do this she can't pull it off.
customer_reviews.author: kjm

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 7 lb Pomeranian and it fits perfect. It is low down on breast bone in front so no straining on the throat. Stays tight, so far no issues pulling out of it
customer_reviews.author: Nanny Pulse

customer_reviews.title: Love Gooby
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs wear the Gooby harness. They are simple yet sturdy. I love this brand the most for my dogs. I have a Havanes and measured her and bought the size recommended. Perfect fit. This is for smaller dogs so buying a L might seem odd so go with what they recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RLB

customer_reviews.title: Best harness ever, buying another for my Boston Terrier.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my English Bulldog, easy to put on and take off. He just steps right into and out of this Gooby. Pull was an issue for our Boston Terrier, tried on him, best walk ever!! Purchasing a second for him. Highly recommend this product and brand!!
customer_reviews.author: RockinMimi

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Breathable!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for this perfect "easy to put on" harness. We love the large buckle! The measurements were perfect. And we really needed a breathable harness here in the heat of LV for our little Frenchie! LoVe it!!!
customer_reviews.author: SMahoney

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this !
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10lb chi-terrier and had already replaced two harness. This one is the best so far . What I absolutely love about this product 1. It has no Velcro. So definitely long lasting compared to other Velcro harness 2. It is choke-free. Despite the fact that My baby pulls the leash all the time , she doesn’t choke anymore. 3. It’s sturdy and well made 4. Looks stylish and neat
customer_reviews.author: Vinodh

customer_reviews.title: Gooby Harness
customer_reviews.text: I received this harness when promised thru Prime Delivery. At first I thought this is never going to fit my Yorkie. I opened the package adjusted the straps and to my amazement it FITS PERFECT. I ordered a small. No more chocking or ill fitting harness. I can't tell you how many harness I have purchased trying to get a perfect fit. I am ordering another one to change out so that I will have a clean one for her after she gets her bath. Thank you to the makers for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Best halter I have used for my elderly dog!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of this halter. Very easy for my older dog to get into and out of. Very soft materials so I don’t have to worry about him being uncomfortable and he definitely isn’t going to get Out of this harness. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B. Woz

customer_reviews.title: BEST harness
customer_reviews.text: My french bulldog was wearing another style of Gooby harness, but outgrew it. I ordered this one, thinking it was the same style, but this one is EVEN better! So easy to get on the little wild man, and I feel like it's very secure- not one he can wiggle or back out of! I'll always get this brand of harnesses in the future!
customer_reviews.author: RonSharpei

customer_reviews.title: Old bad chi didn’t choke!!
customer_reviews.text: This harness was a little underwhelming when I opened it. It looked tiny! But I adjusted the straps and put it on my 8lb chihuahua maybe 7lb. who has a bad habit of choking herself. She’s old and I’m worried about tracheal collapse. She seemed to pull less with it on and didn’t choke at all. It may not last long but at the price I’d be okay with buying it again if it helps her.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci Elizabeth Durham

customer_reviews.title: It works for us
customer_reviews.text: This harness is stretchy enough that my dog got one leg out of it overnight. It didn't come all the way off and didn't seem like it would, but it was around his ribs on one side and normal on the other. He seemed comfortable in it. Directions for putting it on are not helpful, likely based on an old model. I just made sure the dog on the clasp was upright.
customer_reviews.author: lanamp

customer_reviews.title: This was not a medium
customer_reviews.text: The product states "Medium" but does not fit a regular medium dog. We had it clips extended as far as possible, but it still was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna R

customer_reviews.title: This has been the best purchase ever the choke free harness is the best
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best purchase ever the choke free harness is the best. My yorkie puppies both have one but for my over excited pup that pulls the leash it has worked perfect, he races toward every dog wanting to play and always chokes his last harness costed more but did not sit above the shoulders resting below his windpipe. He loves it and steps into it ready to go he dose not like things over his head or on his neck. I'm so glad i bought this product for my fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Harness
customer_reviews.text: This is a really strong harness. I loved using it. Unfortunately, it only lasted a month because my son left it on the floor. My puppy is going through a chewing on everything phase. The harness withstood the chewing, but the plastic buckle didn't. I was sad to see it go.
customer_reviews.author: Caesar

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one is for my small dog. It’s very easy to put on and takeoff. She seems comfortable with it on. I’m not afraid that she can slip out of it. I really like it. The problem is you can’t see the color because it’s underneath her.
customer_reviews.author: Vadarae

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: Living in a hot climate I needed a harness that was a good fit for my dog and did not take up so much space on their body that they would overheat.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonHumm

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my Mini Aussie, but seems to be a very nice harness if it works for your dog
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this item 3 stars because even though it seems like a very comfortable harness, my Mini Aussie slipped right out of it twice. The first time I thought maybe it was a fluke, but when she slipped through it again at the vet's office, I knew it wouldn't work for us. I think it may be because she has very petite front legs she could pull them right through (unintentionally) because of the stretch of the harness. If it hadn't been for that issue, this seems like a very nice, well-made, comfortable harness. Unfortunately I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Critic

customer_reviews.title: That our little girl would not chocke
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, easy to put on and take off. Our girl was happy with it, was not coughing , she does not like having a harness on, she coughs until it is off. With this one we did not get one cough so this is what we we hoping for. We do recommend this, even if your dog is fussy about them, with the other harness she had she could not breathe as easily, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I HAVE 3 OF THESE BUT..
customer_reviews.text: I love the step in concept, design and colors. I've ordered 3 of these for my french Bulldogs. One of my dogs is an 11 mo old rowdy girl who is in and out her pool all day, the fabric gets wet, no biggie, but smells horrendous when it dries. The elastic is starting to weaken and I have to adjust all 3 harnesses daily. It's is a bit of a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9lb Toy Fox Terrier mix and I have bought two other harnesses that did not fit and I ordered per the size chart on each. This one fits perfectly!!! And he will actually walk around in it, not bulky on him at all. My pup is happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, love the easy on/off design, but not the best option for puppies
customer_reviews.text: For the price-over $23- it sure didn’t last long for our puppy-maybe now that she is past the chewing stage we could try again, but it was a disappointment to us for sure. We like how lightweight it is. Would recommend for older dogs but not puppies- even with supervision it was hard to stop her in time.
customer_reviews.author: Special Apps, Special Kids

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great item, made our pup a well-behaved walker. Easy to put on, seems comfortable for the dog. The only issue would be with getting the right fit - with only 4 adjustable straps, it is not too widely configurable, and every dog is a different shape. Luckily, it works well enough for ours!
customer_reviews.author: Portajonk

customer_reviews.title: Xsmall review
customer_reviews.text: The xsmall fit my 5lb Pomeranian perfect. I did have to tighten it though. It’s a nice gentle lightweight but durable harness which is great for xsmall dogs. I didn’t want anything bulky on him.
customer_reviews.author: Lys77

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my 10 month old, 9 lb. miniature poodle. This is the second one I have ordered...make sure it is adjusted to fit your dog. When it’s too loose, he is able to bend his head down and chew on the front of harness. Needless to say, it was ripped. I now take it off after walking and put it up where he can’t have it for a snack. I did notice that price dropped second order, and it was probably because the buckles were plastic instead of metal on first order.
customer_reviews.author: Stiff neck gal

customer_reviews.title: Love this harness!
customer_reviews.text: My Maltese is 9 pounds- I got the small and fits great! I love how easy it is to put on and also how well it fits around my dog’s chest without choking him or his little neck.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I have to return because it was too big for my Chihuahua. I thought I measured correctly. Bummer. It appeared well made and hade a good clasp. My other dog has one like this and likes it. Very comfy for him.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Doggo loves it and so do we.
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple Gooby harnesses. This one is my favorite. It's easy to put on my dog and I feel he is secure in it. He gets excited when we have it in our hands. I wish there was a way to attach a light and or tag to the front.
customer_reviews.author: Shena

customer_reviews.title: Versatile easy to adjust and actually choke free!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this only for walking my Min Pin Chiwawa 6lbs on lunches, for the choke free option(which is amazing! I have tried several "choke free" options and this is the only one.) It is winter here and she also has a doggy car seat so I have a sweater for her, for extra protection from the impact of a possible accident and the cold. I was actually able to adjust this hassle free to fit over her sweater! I now use this as her only harness. With and without her sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Robbi

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful for my 15# pompoo. She has trachea problems & the slightest touch will cause coughing. She has a 17" girth. The medium size fits perfect & leaves a big of room for winter hairdo
customer_reviews.author: Julie Haller

product_meta.title: Gooby Dog Harness - Comfort X Step-in Small Dog Harness with Patented Choke-Free X Frame - Perfect on The Go Easy Walking Harness for Small Dogs or Cat Harness
product_meta.description: Size:Small chest (12.5-15")| Color:PinkEasily one of the best small dog harness available, Gooby comfort x step-in harness provides both the convenience and the safety. Unlike conventional harness, step-in style harness literally takes seconds to put on your dog so you can spend your time doing what's important. Comfort x step-in is made with soft mesh as well as suede trimming, so your dog would feel comfortable throughout the walk.
feature_bullets: DOG HARNESSES FOR SMALL DOGS – Gooby’s Comfort X Step-In Harness is made for small breed dogs. This means that our largest size will fit a dog up to 30 lbs. In order to fully utilize the functionality of the harness, as well as the fit, we recommend measuring the largest part of the dog’s chest. If the measurement is between sizes, please size up.

EASY-ON. EASY-OFF – Our Step In Dog Harness design makes it easy for your dog to step in to the harness and out without a hassle. Simply place the left paw of the dog on the left arm hole, and right paw of the dog on the right arm hole and pull up to fasten.

ADJUSTABILITY – The step in harness for small dogs contains 4 adjustable points . 2 adjustable points on the chest and 2 adjustable points on the neck, which can be used to fit the choke free dog harness perfectly on your small dog or cat depending on the body type.
PATENTED DESIGN – Our patented no choke dog harness X frame (US D798,508 S) sits below the neck and distributes the pull around the chest.

A BRAND YOU CAN TRUST - Gooby Pet launched in 2002 because the pet industry was only focused on basic elements of the harness at that time. Our goal is to simplify pet owner responsibilities. We are determined to create products that are functional and easy-to-use to encourage a better quality of life between our pet owners and their companions. We stand by our products. If you are unsatisfied with your purchase, you may return your order within the return period.

specifications.Manufacturer: Inafiction USA, Inc. dba Gooby Pet Fashion
